thread.title: Megan McKenna breaks down in tears on TOWIE set after admitting she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna breaks down in tears on TOWIE set after admitting she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks

author: Vicki Newman
title: Megan McKenna breaks down in tears on TOWIE set after admitting she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks
text:
Megan McKenna breaks down in tears on TOWIE set after admitting she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks The reality star was comforted by Chloe Sims when she burst out crying during filming Share Megan McKenna broke down in tears while filming scenes for TOWIE (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get celebs     
Megan McKenna is having an emotional time while filming the new series of TOWIE. 
The reality star was comforted by pal Chloe Sims after she broke down in tears while filming scenes for The Only Way Is Essex . 
Megan and Chloe were at Qube, in Essex on Wednesday night when it all got a little overwhelming for Megan, 24. 
The brunette beauty was spotted holding her head in her hands as she burst into tears, with Chloe offering her some comfort and reassurance. Read More The girls were filming at Qube in Essex (Photo: FameFlynet) Chloe tried to comfort Megan (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The girls were dressed to impress in matching gold outfits as they filmed the ITVBe show 's 20th series. 
Megan was wearing a wrap-around dress, while Chloe opted for a strappy backless frock. 
But what is Megan upset about? Could it be something to do with on-off boyfriend Pete Wicks ? 
It comes after Megan admitted she was only "20% happy" with Pete, 28. It got a bit too much for Megan (Photo: FameFlynet) Megan might be upset over on-off boyfriend Pete (Photo: Rex Features) 
Talking about him on the series premiere on Sunday, she told pal Amber: "Obviously you know what's gone on. We end up having a massive row and spit up, I delete all our pictures from Twitter and Instagram." 
Megan admitted she acted like a "lunatic" by cutting pictures of them up and throwing his stuff away, before waking up the following day and realising how much she missed him. 
She said: "The next day I drive round his house asking him to get back together." 
"Last month, we were like 80% rows, 20% happy," she added. Read More Megan hid her face as she burst into tears (Photo: FameFlynet) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
